mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membership (user_code, name, introduction, price, color) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{name}, #{introduction}, #{price}, #{color})
mapper.select: SELECT code, user_code, name, introduction, price, color, is_active, is_deleted, create_date, update_date, delete_date FROM membership WHERE membership.user_code = #{userCode} AND is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE membership SET is_deleted = 'Y', delete_date = NOW() WHERE code = #{code}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO membership_join (membership_code, user_code, create_date, end_date)
VALUES (#{membershipCode}, #{userCode}, #{createDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT m.name, mj.create_date, m.price FROM membership m INNER JOIN membership_join mj ON m.code = mj.membership_code WHERE mj.user_code = #{userCode}
SELECT u.nickname, m.create_date FROM membership_join mj JOIN user u ON u.code = mj.user_code JOIN membership m ON m.code = mj.membership_code WHERE mj.membership_code = #{membershipCode}
